title: Product Listing with Filters and Sorting
description: Verify that the product listing page displays products correctly and that filtering and sorting options properly update the displayed products.

steps.description: Navigate to the Shop page.
Check that a list of products is displayed with their name, price, and image.
Apply a filter by category or attribute (e.g., color or size).
Verify that only products matching the selected filter are displayed.
Apply sorting (e.g., price ascending).
Verify that products are sorted accordingly.
Apply combined filters and sorting.
Verify the product listing updates correctly reflecting all applied filters and sorting.

title: Product Detail Page Display
description: Verify the product detail page shows complete product information including multiple images, attributes, and availability.

steps.description: Navigate to a product detail page by selecting a product from the Shop page.
Check that product name, description, price, available colors, sizes, and multiple images are displayed.
Verify that product attributes are selectable and updating visuals accordingly.
Check product availability status (e.g., in stock or out of stock).

title: User Registration Workflow
description: Verify that a new user can register successfully with valid data, and input validations handle invalid data correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to the Authentication page.
Fill registration form with valid username, email, and password.
Submit the registration form.
Verify successful registration confirmation and automatic or manual login.
Attempt registration with invalid inputs (e.g., invalid email, weak password).
Check appropriate validation error messages are displayed and submission is blocked.

title: User Login Workflow
description: Validate user login functionality with correct and incorrect credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the Authentication page.
Enter valid username/email and password.
Click login button.
Verify user is logged in and redirected to the appropriate page.
Log out and then attempt login with invalid credentials.
Verify that login fails with an appropriate error message.

title: Add Products to Cart and View Cart
description: Ensure products can be added to the cart and the cart page reflects the changes correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to product detail page.
Select product attributes (e.g., size, color) if applicable.
Add product to the cart.
Verify that the cart count reflects the added product.
Navigate to the cart page.
Verify that the added product appears with correct details and quantity.

title: Checkout Process with Address and Payment
description: Validate that users can complete checkout with address selection and payment integration, ensuring transaction safety.

steps.description: Add products to cart.
Navigate to the Checkout page.
Select or enter a valid shipping address.
Choose or enter payment method details.
Submit the order.
Verify that the order is placed successfully, with backend confirming transaction safety and inventory updated.
Attempt to checkout with incomplete or invalid shipping or payment information.
Verify that appropriate validation errors are shown and order submission is blocked.

title: Transaction Safety Under Concurrent Orders
description: Ensure that concurrent order placements for the same product do not cause overselling.

steps.description: Simulate multiple users attempting to place orders simultaneously for a limited-stock product.
Verify that total ordered quantity does not exceed stock and backend locking or transaction mechanisms handle concurrency.
Verify no duplicate or partial orders are processed that could cause inconsistency.

title: User Profile Update and Order History Display
description: Validate that users can update their profile settings and view their past orders correctly.

steps.description: Login as a valid user.
Navigate to the Profile page.
Verify that user information and order history are displayed.
Change some user settings (e.g., email, language preference).
Save the changes.
Verify that changes are persisted and reflected in the UI and backend.

title: Admin Dashboard Product Management
description: Verify that an admin user can create, update, and delete products and that UI updates accordingly.

steps.description: Login as an admin.
Navigate to product management section in the admin dashboard.
Create a new product with multiple attributes and images.
Verify that the new product appears in the product list and backend database.
Edit the product details (e.g., price, stock quantity).
Verify that updates are saved and reflected in the UI.
Delete the product.
Verify the product is removed from the product list and backend.

title: Admin User Role and Permissions Management
description: Ensure admin can manage user roles and permissions with appropriate UI feedback and backend consistency.

steps.description: Login as an admin.
Navigate to user management section.
Change the role or permissions of an existing user.
Verify changes are persisted and the user's access rights are updated accordingly.

title: Outfit Builder Interaction and Data Accuracy
description: Verify that the Outfit Builder allows users to create outfits interactively and visualizes selections correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to the Outfit Builder page.
Select multiple products to add to an outfit.
Verify that selected items are displayed together in the builder with accurate visuals.
Remove or replace items in the outfit.
Verify the outfit updates in real time reflecting changes.
Save the outfit if the feature is available.
Verify saved outfits persist and can be retrieved.

title: Multi-Image Upload for Products
description: Verify multi-image upload functionality during product creation and editing works reliably.

steps.description: Login as admin.
Navigate to product creation or editing page.
Upload multiple images for the product.
Verify that all images are uploaded, displayed correctly, and can be previewed or removed before save.
Save the product.
Verify all images are stored and displayed correctly on the product detail page.

title: Bilingual Content Display - English and Arabic
description: Ensure the application displays content correctly in both English and Arabic languages including UI alignment and text direction.

steps.description: Switch language setting to English.
Verify all UI text is displayed in English with left-to-right alignment.
Switch language setting to Arabic.
Verify all UI text is displayed in Arabic with right-to-left alignment.
Verify product names, descriptions, and UI labels update accordingly and are fully readable.

title: API Authentication and Secure JSON Response
description: Validate that all API endpoints enforce authentication and return correct, secure JSON responses.

steps.description: Send requests to protected API endpoints without authentication.
Verify endpoints reject requests with appropriate authentication error responses.
Send authenticated requests with valid tokens.
Verify endpoints return correct JSON responses with expected data and no sensitive information leaked.
Send malformed or invalid API requests.
Verify proper error messages and status codes are returned without causing server errors.

title: System Logging and Audit Trail Capture
description: Ensure that all critical operations such as logins, product changes, and orders have corresponding log entries and audit trails.

steps.description: Perform critical operations: user login, product creation, order placement.
Verify that logs capture relevant details including timestamps, user info, and action type.
Attempt unauthorized operations and trigger error conditions.
Verify that error and security-related events are logged appropriately.

title: UI Responsiveness Across Screen Sizes
description: Test that the user storefront and admin dashboard UI is responsive and displays correctly on multiple device screen sizes.

steps.description: Open the storefront and admin dashboard on desktop screen.
Verify UI layout is correct, usable, and visually consistent.
Resize window to tablet dimensions and reload the page.
Verify UI components rearrange and remain usable.
Resize to mobile screen size and reload.
Verify layout adjusts for mobile, including navigation and interactive elements.
